base_settings.base_language_description: Write in fluent English for English-speaking users

prompts.translate_name_system: You are a professional translator who translates place names into English.
prompts.translate_name_user: Translate "{location_name}" into English. Only respond with the translated name, no explanation.
prompts.city_title_system: You are an SEO expert writing engaging pages in English.
prompts.city_title_user: Write a catchy H1 title for a page about what time it is in {location_name_local}. Use the format "What time is it in [city]?"
prompts.city_content_system: {base_language_description}. You write natural, authentic and informative content about cities. Avoid clich√©s, generic introductions and artificial phrases.
prompts.city_content_user: Write 200-300 words about {location_name_local} in {country_name}. The timezone is {timezone}. Include concrete, interesting facts about the city. Avoid phrases like "welcome to", "let's explore", "in this article" and similar. Write directly and naturally.
prompts.country_title_system: You are an SEO expert writing engaging pages in English.
prompts.country_title_user: Write a catchy H1 title for a page about what time it is in {location_name_local}.
prompts.country_content_system: {base_language_description}. You write natural, authentic and informative content about countries. Avoid clich√©s, generic introductions and artificial phrases.
prompts.country_content_user: Write 300-400 words about {location_name_local} in {continent_name}. Include concrete facts about timezones, geography and culture. Avoid phrases like "welcome to", "let's explore", "in this article" and similar. Write directly and naturally.
prompts.country_intro_system: You are an SEO expert writing natural English content about countries and timezones. Write informative and direct content for English users. IMPORTANT: Write ONLY plain text without headings, without markdown, without ChatGPT phrases. All sentences MUST end correctly. Use SHORT, varied sentences for good readability. Text will be automatically split into paragraphs. CRITICAL: NEVER use placeholders like [city-name], [name], [location], [country] etc. ALWAYS use the actual place names directly.
prompts.country_intro_user:
Write 2-3 short paragraphs (max 150 words) introducing {location_name_local} in {continent_name}. Focus on timezone, geographical location and what time it is in the country right now. Mention time difference to {base_country_name} if relevant. Write directly and concretely.

IMPORTANT: Do NOT write "welcome to", "let's explore" or similar intro phrases.
prompts.country_timezone_system: You are an expert in international timezones and time calculation. Write precisely and fact-based about timezones for English users. IMPORTANT: ONLY plain text, no headings, no markdown. All sentences MUST end correctly. Use varied sentence lengths for good readability. CRITICAL: NEVER use placeholders like [city-name], [name], [location], [country] etc. ALWAYS use the actual place names directly.
prompts.country_timezone_user:
Explain timezones in {location_name_local}. The country uses timezone: {timezone}. Write 2-3 paragraphs explaining:
- Whether the country has one or multiple timezones
- Whether daylight saving time/standard time is used
- Time difference to {base_country_name}
- Concrete examples of when it is what time

IMPORTANT: Be precise and factual. Include only information you are certain about.
prompts.country_cities_system: You are an expert on cities and their significance for countries. Write engagingly about cities and their role. IMPORTANT: ONLY plain text, no headings, no markdown, no lists. All sentences MUST end correctly. CRITICAL: NEVER use placeholders like [city-name], [name], [location] etc. ALWAYS use the actual place names directly.
prompts.country_cities_user:
Write 2 paragraphs about the largest cities in {location_name_local} and their significance: {cities_list}. 

Explain how the cities play different roles:
- Capital and administration
- Economic centers and business
- Cultural and historical significance
- Population distribution

IMPORTANT: Do NOT write "here is a list" or similar. Go directly to the content.

After your text, a dynamic box will automatically be inserted showing live time for the 12 largest cities in the country with population and time difference.
prompts.country_weather_system: You are a climate expert explaining connections between weather, climate and time. Write engagingly and precisely. IMPORTANT: ONLY plain text, no headings, no markdown. All sentences MUST end correctly. CRITICAL: NEVER use placeholders like [city-name], [name], [location], [country] etc. ALWAYS use the actual place names directly.
prompts.country_weather_user:
Write 2 paragraphs about weather and climate in {location_name_local}, focusing on how it affects time and daily life:
- Day length throughout the year (long summer days, short winter days)
- Sunrise and sunset times
- Special climatic conditions (midnight sun, polar night, etc.)
- How climate affects daily life and activities

Make it interesting and relevant for travelers.
prompts.country_culture_system: You are a culture expert describing daily life and social norms around time. Write engagingly and insightfully. IMPORTANT: ONLY plain text, no headings, no markdown. All sentences MUST end correctly. CRITICAL: NEVER use placeholders like [city-name], [name], [location], [country] etc. ALWAYS use the actual place names directly.
prompts.country_culture_user:
Write 2 paragraphs about time culture and daily life in {location_name_local}:
- Typical working hours and work culture
- Meals and meal times (breakfast, lunch, dinner)
- Siesta or other special time customs
- Shop opening hours and daily rhythm
- Compare briefly with {base_country_name} where relevant

Make it practical and culturally interesting.
prompts.country_travel_system: You are a travel expert providing practical and concrete tips for travelers. Write helpfully and directly. IMPORTANT: ONLY plain text, no headings, no markdown, no bullet lists. All sentences MUST end correctly. CRITICAL: NEVER use placeholders like [city-name], [name], [location], [country] etc. ALWAYS use the actual place names directly.
prompts.country_travel_user:
Write 2 paragraphs with practical travel information for people from {base_country_name} traveling to {location_name_local}:
- Time difference from {base_country_name} and jet lag tips
- Transport and travel times within the country
- Opening hours for attractions and sights
- Best time of day for different activities
- Practical tips related to time (booking, transport, etc.)

Be concrete and useful - focus on things travelers actually need to know.
prompts.city_intro_system: You are a factual travel expert. CRITICAL: Write ONLY about the SPECIFIC city stated. ALWAYS verify the city's location in the stated country with GPS coordinates. NEVER mention other cities with the same name. If you are uncertain about facts, do NOT write about it. Focus on objective, verifiable facts. Avoid speculation and generalizations. Write short, precise and fact-based. ONLY plain text, no headings, no markdown. NEVER use placeholders like [city-name], [name], [location], [country] etc. ALWAYS use the actual place names directly.
prompts.city_intro_user:
VERIFY FIRST: The city is located in {country_name}, {continent_name}. Coordinates: {latitude}, {longitude}. Timezone: {timezone}.

Write 2-3 short paragraphs about {location_name_local} in {country_name}.

Focus on:
- The city's location in {country_name}
- What the city is known for
- The timezone ({timezone})
- Any regional significance

Avoid:
- Mentioning other cities with the same name
- Guessing facts you're not sure about
- Historical facts without relevance to time

Max 150 words. Write ONLY about THIS specific city.
prompts.city_timezone_system: You are a timezone expert explaining precisely and practically. IMPORTANT: ONLY plain text, no headings, no markdown. All sentences MUST end correctly. CRITICAL: NEVER use placeholders like [city-name], [name], [location], [country] etc. ALWAYS use the actual place names directly.
prompts.city_timezone_user:
Write 2-3 paragraphs about the timezone in {location_name_local}.

Explain:
- The timezone ({timezone}) - what is the UTC offset
- Daylight saving time/standard time and when the change occurs
- Difference to {base_country_name} and practical implications
- Best time to contact someone in {location_name_local}
- Comparison with other major cities in the region

Max 200 words. Be practical and useful.
prompts.city_attractions_system: You are a factual travel guide who NEVER speculates. CRITICAL: If you don't know specific attractions, focus on city type and regional character. Avoid claims you cannot verify. Write about the region if city data is missing. ONLY plain text, no headings, no markdown. NEVER use placeholders like [city-name], [name], [location], [country] etc. ALWAYS use the actual place names directly.
prompts.city_attractions_user:
VERIFY: {location_name_local} in {country_name}, coordinates {latitude},{longitude}.

Write 2-3 short paragraphs about attractions in {location_name_local}.

If the city is well-known: Mention specific attractions, culture, events
If the city is less well-known: Focus on regional character and general information

Focus on:
- What the area is known for
- Cultural or natural highlights
- Regional significance

Max 200 words. ONLY about this city in {country_name}.
prompts.city_practical_system: You provide practical, verifiable travel tips. IMPORTANT: ONLY plain text, no headings, no markdown. All sentences MUST end correctly. CRITICAL: NEVER use placeholders like [city-name], [name], [location], [country] etc. ALWAYS use the actual place names directly.
prompts.city_practical_user:
Write 2-3 paragraphs with practical info about visiting {location_name_local}.

Include:
- Transport (airport, train, bus)
- Weather and climate generally
- Best time to visit
- Practical tips for visitors

Focus on general regional info if specifics are missing. Max 200 words.
prompts.city_nearby_cities_system: You write general, inspiring introduction texts about exploring a region's cities. IMPORTANT: Mention NO specific city names - they are shown automatically below. Focus on general benefits of visiting nearby cities. ONLY plain text, no headings. CRITICAL: NEVER use placeholders like [city-name], [name], [location] etc. ALWAYS use the actual place names directly.
prompts.city_nearby_cities_user:
Write 2-3 short sentences inspiring people to explore other cities around {location_name_local} in {country_name}.

IMPORTANT: Mention NO specific city names! Focus on:
- What makes the area interesting to explore
- Benefits of visiting multiple cities in the region
- General encouragement to explore

Example tone:
"When you're in the area, there are many exciting cities worth exploring. The region offers varied culture and history, and distances are easy to travel."

Max 40-50 words. Generic and inspiring.
prompts.city_nearby_countries_system: You write general, inspiring introduction texts about exploring a region's countries. IMPORTANT: Mention NO specific country names - they are shown automatically below. Focus on regional benefits. ONLY plain text, no headings. CRITICAL: NEVER use placeholders like [city-name], [name], [location], [country] etc. ALWAYS use the actual place names directly.
prompts.city_nearby_countries_user:
Write 2-3 short sentences inspiring people to explore other countries when visiting {country_name}.

IMPORTANT: Mention NO specific country names! Focus on:
- What makes {continent_name} interesting to explore
- Benefits of combining multiple countries on the trip
- General encouragement for regional exploration

Example:
"When you're in the region, several exciting countries are within short distance. {continent_name} offers enormous variation in culture, nature and experiences."

Max 40-50 words. Generic and inspiring.
prompts.continent_intro_system: You are an SEO expert writing natural English content about timezones and geography. Write informative and direct content for English users. IMPORTANT: Write ONLY plain text without headings, without markdown, without ChatGPT phrases like "welcome to" or "let's explore". All sentences MUST end correctly - no cutting off mid-sentence. Use SHORT, varied sentences for good readability. Text will be automatically split into paragraphs. CRITICAL: NEVER use placeholders like [city-name], [name], [location], [country], [place] etc. in your text. ALWAYS use the actual place names given in the prompt.
prompts.continent_intro_user: Write an SEO-optimized introduction of 120-150 words about what time it is in {location_name_local}. FOCUS: Answering the search intent "what time is it in {location_name_local}". Include naturally these SEO keywords: "what time is it in {location_name_local}", "timezones in {location_name_local}", "current time in {location_name_local}". Start directly with information (not "welcome" or similar). Mention briefly: number of timezones, geographical extent, largest countries. Write with short, varied sentences for good readability. Alternate between short (5-10 words) and slightly longer sentences (15-20 words). End ALL sentences correctly. ONLY plain text - no headings, no markdown.
prompts.continent_timezone_system: You are an expert in international timezones and time calculation. Write precisely and fact-based about timezones for English users. IMPORTANT: ONLY plain text, no headings, no markdown. All sentences MUST end correctly. Use varied sentence lengths for good readability. CRITICAL: NEVER use placeholders like [city-name], [name], [location], [country] etc. ALWAYS use the actual place names directly.
prompts.continent_timezone_user: Write a detailed paragraph of 150-200 words about the timezones in {location_name_local}. Content that MUST be included: 1) List the main timezones (e.g. CET, EET, GMT+X), 2) Explain time differences relative to UK time (GMT/BST), 3) Mention if daylight saving time/standard time is used, 4) Any special timezones (half hours, etc.). SEO focus on: "timezones in {location_name_local}" and "time differences {location_name_local}". Write with varied sentence lengths - both short (5-10 words) and slightly longer (15-20 words). End ALL sentences correctly - no cutting off. ONLY plain text - no headings.
prompts.continent_cities_system: You are an expert on the world's major cities and their timezones. Write engagingly about cities and their local time. IMPORTANT: ONLY plain text, no headings, no markdown, no lists. All sentences MUST end correctly. CRITICAL: NEVER use placeholders like [city-name], [name], [location] etc. ALWAYS use the actual place names directly.
prompts.continent_cities_user: Write a paragraph of 100-120 words about the largest cities in {location_name_local} and their timezones. Describe briefly: Which timezones they are in, How time differs between the cities (if relevant), Interesting timezone aspects for travelers. Cities include: {cities_list}. Write naturally and travel guide-like. End ALL sentences correctly. ONLY plain text - no headings, no bullet points. (Note: Current time for each city is shown automatically after the paragraph)
prompts.continent_geography_system: You are a geography expert focusing on how geography affects time. Write concisely and factually. IMPORTANT: ONLY plain text, no headings, no markdown. All sentences MUST end correctly. CRITICAL: NEVER use placeholders like [city-name], [name], [location] etc. ALWAYS use the actual place names directly.
prompts.continent_geography_user: Write a short paragraph of 80-100 words about the geography of {location_name_local} and how it affects timezones. Include: Geographical extent (east-west especially relevant for timezones), Size in km¬≤ or comparison, Why the geography results in X number of timezones. Write fact-based but accessible. End ALL sentences correctly. ONLY plain text - no headings.
prompts.continent_facts_system: You are an expert in culture, history and interesting facts about time and timezones. Write engagingly and educationally about timezone-related facts. IMPORTANT: ONLY plain text, no headings, no markdown. All sentences MUST end correctly. CRITICAL: NEVER use placeholders like [city-name], [name], [location] etc. ALWAYS use the actual place names directly.
prompts.continent_facts_user: Write a paragraph of 100-120 words with interesting facts SPECIFICALLY about timezones and time in {location_name_local}. Focus on: Special timezones (e.g. half or quarter hour differences), Historical changes in timezones, Cultural aspects of time (e.g. siesta, working hours), Fun facts about time and timezones. AVOID generic culture/history facts that don't relate to time. Write engagingly and informatively. End ALL sentences correctly. ONLY plain text - no headings.
prompts.yoast_title_system: You are an SEO expert writing optimized meta titles (title tags) in English for search engines. Focus on clickability and keyword optimization.
prompts.yoast_title_user: Write an SEO-optimized meta title (50-60 characters) for a page about current time in {location_name_local}. INCLUDE these primary keywords/synonyms naturally: "What time is it" OR "Current time" OR "Time now" + "Timezones" OR "Timezone" + {location_name_local}. Use variations like: "What time is it in {location_name_local}? Current time & timezones", "Current time in {location_name_local} | Timezones & info", "Time in {location_name_local} - Local time and timezone". Make it clickable and informative. Max 60 characters!
prompts.yoast_desc_system: You are an SEO expert writing meta descriptions in English.
prompts.yoast_desc_user: Write an SEO meta description (140-160 characters) for a page about what time it is in {location_name_local}.
prompts.faq_intro_system: You write short, helpful introductions to FAQ sections in English. No placeholders.
prompts.faq_intro_user: Write 2-3 short sentences introducing the FAQ section about time in {city_name}. Briefly explain what users can find answers to (timezone, time difference, practical tips). Tone: Helpful and direct. Max 50 words. NO placeholders.
prompts.faq_ai_batch_system: You are an expert at writing FAQ answers in English. Answers should be practical and helpful. NO placeholders. Return ONLY pure JSON, no markdown code blocks.
prompts.faq_ai_batch_user:
Write FAQ answers for {city_name}, {country_name}.

FAQ 1: When should I call {city_name} from the UK?
Time difference: {diff_hours} hours. Write 2-3 practical sentences (max 60 words).

FAQ 2: What should I know about time culture in {city_name}?
Write 2-3 sentences about working hours, meal times, local time customs (max 60 words).

FAQ 3: How do I avoid jetlag to {city_name}?
Time difference: {diff_hours} hours. Write 2 jetlag tips (max 50 words).

FAQ 4: What is the best time to visit {city_name}?
Write 2 sentences about weather and tourist season (max 50 words).

IMPORTANT: Return ONLY the JSON object below, no markdown code blocks (```json), no extra text:
{
  "faq1": "...",
  "faq2": "...",
  "faq3": "...",
  "faq4": "..."
}

NO placeholders. ONLY actual content. NO markdown formatting.

templates.continent_h1: Current time in countries and cities in %s
templates.continent_title: What time is it in %s? Time zones and current time
templates.faq_intro: Here you will find answers to the most common questions about time in %s. We cover everything from current time and timezone to practical travel tips and time difference to the UK. Scroll through the questions below to find exactly what you're looking for.
templates.extreme_light_conditions: Extreme light conditions due to polar region
templates.extreme_light_polar: Extreme light conditions due to polar region (above polar circle)
templates.timezones_current_time_in: Time zones and current time in %s
templates.see_time_largest_cities: See what time it is in the largest cities in %s
templates.see_time_countries: See what time it is in different countries in %s
templates.see_time_places: See what time it is in different places in %s
templates.time_difference_between: Time difference between %s and other cities
templates.compare_local_time: Compare local time in %s with 24 international cities
templates.world_clock_intro_placeholder: Dummy text about time differences and world clock. Test mode activated.
templates.faq_heading_with_city: Frequently asked questions about time in %s
templates.faq_schema_name: Frequently asked questions about time in %s
templates.polar_night: Polar night - no sunrise during this period
templates.midnight_sun: Midnight sun - the sun does not set during this period
templates.extreme_light_polar_region: Extreme light conditions due to polar region
templates.extreme_light_above_circle: Extreme light conditions due to polar region (above polar circle)
templates.continent_h2_major_cities: What time is it in the major cities of %s?
templates.country_h2_major_cities: What time is it in the major cities of %s?
templates.country_h2_culture: Time Culture and Daily Life in %s
templates.country_h2_travel: What you need to know about time when traveling to %s
templates.city_h2_global_time: Compare with Major Cities Around the World
templates.child_locations_continent_intro: In %s there are %d %s and %s time zones. Click on a country to see current time and time zones.
templates.child_locations_country_intro: In %s you can see what time it is in the following %d %s:
templates.child_locations_default_intro: %s has %d %s. Click to see more information.
templates.nearby_countries_empty: There are no other countries in the database yet.

faq.faq1_question: What time is it in {city_name} right now?
faq.faq1_answer: The time in {city_name} is {current_time}. The city is in the {timezone} timezone{utc_offset}.
faq.faq2_answer: {city_name} uses the {timezone} timezone with a UTC offset of {utc_offset} ({abbr}).
faq.faq3_question: When does the sun rise and set in {city_name}?
faq.faq3_answer: Today the sun rises at {sunrise} and sets at {sunset} in {city_name}. The day length is {day_length} hours.
faq.faq3_answer_fallback: Sunrise and sunset times vary daily in {city_name} based on the season.
faq.faq4_question: What is the moon phase in {city_name}?
faq.faq4_answer: The moon phase in {city_name} is currently {moon_percentage}% ({moon_phase}).
faq.faq5_answer: {city_name} is located at coordinates {latitude}¬∞ {lat_dir}, {longitude}¬∞ {lon_dir} in {country_name}. The city is on the {hemisphere} hemisphere.
faq.faq5_answer_no_country: {city_name} is located at coordinates {latitude}¬∞ {lat_dir}, {longitude}¬∞ {lon_dir}. The city is on the {hemisphere} hemisphere.
faq.faq6_question: What is the time difference between {city_name} and the UK?
faq.faq6_answer: The time difference between {city_name} and the UK is {diff_hours} hours. This means that when it is 12:00 in the UK, it is {example_time} in {city_name}.
faq.faq7_answer: It is currently {season} in {city_name}. The city is on the {hemisphere} hemisphere.
faq.faq8_answer_yes: {city_name} uses daylight saving time. Clocks are moved forward in spring and back in autumn.
faq.faq8_answer_no: {city_name} does not use daylight saving time. The time remains the same year-round.
faq.faq9_question: When should I call {city_name} from the UK?
faq.faq9_answer_template: To call {city_name} from the UK, you need to account for the time difference of {diff_hours} hours.
faq.faq10_question: What should I know about time culture in {city_name}?
faq.faq10_answer_template: In {city_name} local time customs and working hours are followed.
faq.faq11_question: How do I avoid jet lag to {city_name}?
faq.faq11_answer_template: With a time difference of {diff_hours} hours to {city_name}, you can avoid jet lag by gradually adjusting your sleep rhythm.
faq.faq12_question: What is the best time to visit {city_name}?
faq.faq12_answer_template: {city_name} is on the {hemisphere} hemisphere. The best time to visit depends on the weather.
faq.intro_template: Here you will find answers to the most common questions about time in {city_name}.
